thread.title: Peter Smith
thread.title_full: Pimlico Plumbers reviewed by Peter Smith

author: Peter Smith
title: Peter Smith
text:
I was delighted with the work undertaken by Pimlico Plumbers electrician Trevor Smith.
We needed to have an electric fire and large TV moved on a wall in our newly decorated living room, which he did in an expert and efficient manner.
He made good the site including filling the old holes in the wall and left the room clean and tidy.
He was friendly and helpful and I would not hesitate to use Pimlico Plumbers again.
I would not even think about calling out anybody else.
